==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Sachya)
:'''Sachya:''' Ah, what a lovely challenge trial. Shame we can't find its like outside of eruption cycles...
:'''Sachya:''' Hey there, outland warrior. Nice eyes you've got. I can see the resolve in 'em! So! Want to try this rolling boulder trail out? Rules are simple! Break through those rolling boulders and reach the end of the track!
:'''Sachya:''' It's pretty challenging if I do say so myself. What say you? Want to give this a whirl?
:{{DIcon|Quest}} Let's begin!
:;(Challenge begins)
:{{DIcon}} Give me a moment to prep...

:'''Sachya:''' Well, I've had my eyes opened today, that's for sure. Here! Your reward. You've more than earned it!
